metadata.title: President prorogues joint session of Parliament

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday prorogued the joint session of Parliament, which was scheduled to be held on February 18 (Tuesday), for an indefinite period. The session of Majlis-e-Shura (Parliament) was originally convened on January 24, 2025, under Article 54(1) of the Constitution. However, the President has now prorogued.
